query: best boutique hotels in atlanta with rooftop lounges
title: Best Boutique Hotels in Atlanta with Rooftop Lounges
excerpt: Discovering the perfect boutique hotel with a rooftop lounge in Atlanta can be a daunting task, given the city's vast array of options. This curated list not only simplifies your search but also highlights unique venues that offer stunning views, stylish atmospheres, and memorable experiences. Whether you are visiting for business or leisure, these hotels promise to elevate your stay to new heights.
intro: In this article, readers will uncover the best boutique hotels in Atlanta that feature inviting rooftop lounges perfect for relaxation and socializing.

hotels.name: Hotel Colee, Atlanta Buckhead, Autograph Collection
hotels.description: Discover unparalleled luxury at Hotel Colee, featuring an stunning outdoor infinity pool with panoramic city views and a chic rooftop bar perfect for evening relaxation. Each room is equipped with modern comforts, including a 37-inch flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station, and a refreshing rainfall shower, complemented by complimentary Lather toiletries. Ideally situated near shopping and attractions like the Atlanta Botanical Garden and High Museum of Art, Hotel Colee promises an unforgettable Atlanta getaway.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Colee offers a chic rooftop bar and stunning outdoor infinity pool with panoramic city views.

hotels.name: The Georgian Terrace
hotels.description: Experience the elegance of The Georgian Terrace, a historic gem on Atlanta's Peachtree Street, where classically styled rooms blend with modern comforts, including flat-screen TVs and eco-friendly toiletries. Savor gourmet dishes at The Livingston Restaurant and Bar, or unwind with craft cocktails at the intimate Edgar's Proof and Provision speakeasy. With a rooftop pool, a well-equipped fitness center, and prime access to local attractions like the Fox Theatre, this hotel ensures a memorable stay in the heart of the city.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a stunning rooftop pool and gourmet dining options, all set in a historic Atlanta landmark.

hotels.name: Hilton Atlanta
hotels.description: Discover unparalleled comfort at the Downtown Atlanta Hilton, where each room boasts modern amenities like a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine, with spacious suites available for those seeking extra luxury. Savor diverse culinary delights at four on-site restaurants, including fine dining at Nikolaiâ€™s Roof, which offers stunning skyline views. With extensive meeting spaces, a fitness center, and dedicated concierge services, this hotel is perfect for both business travelers and leisure seekers alike.
hotels.highlight: Offers a rooftop lounge with stunning skyline views and spacious family rooms for an elevated stay in downtown Atlanta.

hotels.name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Midtown
hotels.description: Experience comfort and convenience at the Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Midtown, featuring a refreshing outdoor pool and complimentary Wi-Fi to keep you connected. Each room boasts modern amenities, including flat-screen TVs and MP3 docking stations, while the on-site Great American Grille offers delectable dining options throughout the day. With nearby attractions like the Georgia Aquarium and World of Coca Cola, your stay promises both relaxation and adventure in the heart of Atlanta.
hotels.highlight: Offers a rooftop garden with stunning views, an outdoor pool, and family rooms for a comfortable stay.

hotels.name: Hotel Clermont
hotels.description: Experience luxury at Hotel Clermont with 94 air-conditioned rooms equipped with flat-screen TVs and designer toiletries. Enjoy a variety of amenities, including a fitness center, a rooftop terrace, and Tiny Lou's restaurant, perfect for satisfying your culinary cravings. Nestled in Atlanta's lively Poncey-Highland neighborhood, the hotel is just minutes from major attractions and the vibrant Ponce City Market, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a stunning rooftop terrace, fitness center, and 94 air-conditioned rooms with designer toiletries in Atlanta's Poncey-Highland neighborhood.

hotels.name: The Starling Atlanta Midtown, Curio Collection by Hilton
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at The Starling Atlanta Midtown, Curio Collection by Hilton, featuring plush guestrooms with pillow-top mattresses and modern amenities like large flat-screen TVs. Guests can indulge in relaxation at the seasonal outdoor pool or rejuvenate at the state-of-the-art fitness center and spa. With dedicated concierge services to assist with reservations and transportation, your stay promises exceptional comfort and convenience.
hotels.highlight: Offers a stunning rooftop garden, spa services, and dedicated concierge to enhance your stay in Atlanta.
